title: What is this matchmaking???
body:
I'm level 20.
I have an Ahri with a Plat border.

What?????

replies.body:
Normals mmr and ranked mmr are **not the same**. 
In normals you will be matched with anyone and everyone.

 A lot of higher ranked players (in ranked), have low normal mmr as they don't play that queue that often. This can sometimes lead to them getting matched with lower level players.

You also have to take into consideration that the ahri might be duo with a friend that is lower level, or rank, and that could result in the match. 

It's fine, just learn to accept it and eventually you will bring yourself up to their level.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jNm6kRVw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-14T10:40:02.684+0000)
>
> Normals mmr and ranked mmr are **not the same**. 
> In normals you will be matched with anyone and everyone.
> 
>  A lot of higher ranked players (in ranked), have low normal mmr as they don't play that queue that often. This can sometimes lead to them getting matched with lower level players.
> 
> You also have to take into consideration that the ahri might be duo with a friend that is lower level, or rank, and that could result in the match. 
> 
> It's fine, just learn to accept it and eventually you will bring yourself up to their level.

They are the same at the moment, actually, norms have been more balanced.
Yeah I found out Ahri was premade with my Ezreal who must've been lower than 30 like me
